original_text: so that they even carried out the sick into the streets and laid them on cots and mats, that as Peter came by at least his shadow might fall on some of them.
korean_text: 심지어 병든 사람을 메고 거리에 나가 침대와 요 위에 누이고 베드로가 지날 때에 혹 그의 그림자라도 누구에게 덮일까 바라고

sentences.original_text: so that they even carried out the sick
and laid them on cots and mats
at least his shadow might fall on some of them
sentences.korean_translation: 적어도 그의 그림자가 그들 중 누군가에게 떨어지게 하려 함이라
